import { Breadcrumb, BreadcrumbItem, Button, Card, CardHeader, CardBody, CardTitle, Container, Row, Col, FormGroup, Input, Label } from "reactstrap"; import { useForm } from "react-hook-form"; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import React, { useEffect, useState} from 'react'; import _ from "lodash/fp"; import '../driver.scss'; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import API from '../../../helpers/api'; import * as yup from 'yup'; import { yupResolver } from '@hookform/resolvers/yup'; const AddDriverAddressSchema = yup.object().shape({ address1: yup.string().required(), address2: yup.string(), city: yup.string().required(), country: yup.string().required(), state: yup.string() .required() .matches(/^[0-9]+$/, "Must be only digits") .min(1) .max(2) }); function AddDriverAddress(props){ const { register, handleSubmit, watch, errors } = useForm({ mode: 'onChange', resolver: yupResolver(AddDriverAddressSchema) }); const history = useHistory(); const[drivers, setDrivers]=useState([]); const[address1Class, setAddress1Class] = useState(''); const[address2Class, setAddress2Class] = useState(''); const[cityClass, setCityClass] = useState(''); const[stateClass, setStateClass] = useState(''); const[countryClass, setcountryClass] = useState(''); const OnSubmit = async (data) => { const response = await API('drivers', 'POST', data); if(response.id){ history.push('/driver-list'); } } return( <>

Driver Address
{_.get("address1.type", errors) === "required" && (

This field is required

)} {_.get("address1.type", errors) === "pattern" && (

Address should be letters only

)}
); } export default AddDriverAddress;
